
Simple container
.
:::
*content*
:::
.
*content*
.


Can contain block elements too
.
:::
### heading

-----------
:::
.
### heading

-----------
.


Can contain the : charcater
.
:::
This is a list:
* item 1
* item 2
* item 3
:::
.
This is a list:
* item 1
* item 2
* item 3
.


Can contain HTML
.
:::
<div>
  <strong>Hello world</strong>
</div>
:::
.
<div>
  <strong>Hello world</strong>
</div>
.
